verses.verse: Rebuke <S%G1969><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> an elder <S%G4245><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> exhort <S%G3870><s%> him as <S%G5613><s%> a father <S%G3962><s%>; the younger men <S%G3501><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>:
the elder women <S%G4245><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> mothers <S%G3384><s%>; the younger <S%G3501><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> sisters <S%G79><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> purity <S%G47><s%>.
Honor <S%G5091><s%> widows <S%G5503><s%> that are <S%G3689><s%> widows <S%G5503><s%> indeed <S%G3689><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> widow <S%G5503><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> grandchildren <S%G1549><s%>, let them learn <S%G3129><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> to show piety <S%G2151><s%> towards their own family <S%G3624><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G591><s%> requite <S%G287><s%> their parents <S%G4269><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> acceptable <S%G587><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> she that <S%G3588><s%> is <S%G3689><s%> a widow <S%G5503><s%> indeed <S%G3689><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> desolate <S%G3443><s%>, hath her hope <S%G1679><s%> set on <S%G1909><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> continueth in <S%G4357><s%> supplications <S%G1162><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> prayers <S%G4335><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> she that <S%G3588><s%> giveth herself to pleasure <S%G4684><s%> is dead <S%G2348><s%> while she liveth <S%G2198><s%>.
<S%G2532><s%> These things <S%G5023><s%> also command <S%G3853><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they may be <S%G5600><s%> without reproach <S%G423><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> provideth <S%G4306><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> for <S%G4306><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> specially <S%G3122><s%> his own household <S%G3609><s%>, he hath denied <S%G720><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> worse <S%G5501><s%> than an unbeliever <S%G571><s%>.

Let <S%G2639><s%> none <S%G3361><s%> be enrolled <S%G2639><s%> as a widow <S%G5503><s%> under <S%G1640><s%> threescore <S%G1835><s%> years old <S%G2094><s%>, having been <S%G1096><s%> the wife <S%G1135><s%> of one <S%G1520><s%> man <S%G435><s%>,

well reported of <S%G3140><s%> for <S%G1722><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>; if <S%G1487><s%> she hath brought up children <S%G5044><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> she hath used hospitality to strangers <S%G3580><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> she hath washed <S%G3538><s%> the saints <S%G40><s%>' feet <S%G4228><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> she hath relieved <S%G1884><s%> the afflicted <S%G2346><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> she hath diligently followed <S%G1872><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work <S%G2041><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> younger <S%G3501><s%> widows <S%G5503><s%> refuse <S%G3868><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> they have waxed wanton against <S%G2691><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, they desire <S%G2309><s%> to marry <S%G1060><s%>;
having <S%G2192><s%> condemnation <S%G2917><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> they have rejected <S%G114><s%> their <S%G3588><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> pledge <S%G4102><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> withal <S%G260><s%> they learn <S%G3129><s%> also to be idle <S%G692><s%>, going about <S%G4022><s%> from house to house <S%G3614><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> idle <S%G692><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> tattlers <S%G5397><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> busybodies <S%G4021><s%>, speaking <S%G2980><s%> things which <S%G3588><s%> they ought <S%G1163><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>.

I desire <S%G1014><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> that <S%G1060><s%> the younger widows <S%G3501><s%> marry <S%G1060><s%>, bear children <S%G5041><s%>, rule the household <S%G3616><s%>, give <S%G1325><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> occasion <S%G874><s%> to the adversary <S%G480><s%> for reviling <S%G3059><s%>:
for <S%G1063><s%> already <S%G2235><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> are <S%G1624><s%> turned aside <S%G1624><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%>.

If <S%G1487><s%> any5100, Nahum3, 2228 woman <S%G4103><s%> that believeth <S%G4103><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> widows <S%G5503><s%>, let her relieve <S%G1884><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> let <S%G916><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%> be burdened <S%G916><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> it may relieve <S%G1884><s%> them that <S%G3588><s%> are <S%G3689><s%> widows <S%G5503><s%> indeed <S%G3689><s%>.

Let <S%G515><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%> that rule <S%G4291><s%> well <S%G2573><s%> be counted worthy <S%G515><s%> of double <S%G1362><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%>, especially <S%G3122><s%> those who labor <S%G2872><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in teaching <S%G1319><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the scripture <S%G1124><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%>, Thou shalt <S%G5392><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> muzzle <S%G5392><s%> the ox <S%G1016><s%> when he treadeth out the corn <S%G248><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%>, The laborer <S%G2040><s%> is worthy <S%G514><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> hire <S%G3408><s%>.

Against <S%G2596><s%> an elder <S%G4245><s%> receive <S%G3858><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> an accusation <S%G2724><s%>, except <S%G1622><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the mouth of two <S%G1417><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> witnesses <S%G3144><s%>.

Them that sin <S%G264><s%> reprove <S%G1651><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> the rest <S%G3062><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> may <S%G2192><s%> be in fear <S%G5401><s%>.

I charge <S%G1263><s%> thee in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and2532, 2962 Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the elect <S%G1588><s%> angels <S%G32><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> thou observe <S%G5442><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> prejudice <S%G4299><s%>, doing <S%G4160><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> partiality <S%G4346><s%>.

Lay <S%G2007><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> hastily <S%G5030><s%> on <S%G2007><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%>, neither <S%G3366><s%> be partaker of <S%G2841><s%> other men <S%G245><s%>'s sins <S%G266><s%>: keep <S%G5083><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%> pure <S%G53><s%>.

Be no longer <S%G3371><s%> a drinker <S%G5202><s%> of water <S%G5202><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> use <S%G5530><s%> a little <S%G3641><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> stomach <S%G4751><s%>'s sake <S%G1223><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> often <S%G4437><s%> infirmities <S%G769><s%>.

Some <S%G5100><s%> men <S%G444><s%>'s sins <S%G266><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> evident <S%G4271><s%>, going before <S%G4254><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> men also they follow after <S%G1872><s%>.

In like <S%G5615><s%> manner also <S%G2532><s%> there are <S%G2076><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> that are <S%G2192><s%> evident <S%G4271><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> such as are <S%G2192><s%> otherwise <S%G247><s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> be hid <S%G2928><s%>.
